data.text:
Happy 2021 to one and all! See you back on board very soon! ✈️
#BackInTheSkyTogether
https://t.co/tQPRSlAzxY

@LindsayRoseEliz Hallo, you can bring a small personal item in addition to your hand baggage (dimensions for carry-on baggage: max 55x40x20cm). Total weight should be 8kg. At your disposal for further questions. Kind regards

data.text: @LindsayRoseEliz @lufthansa Good morning, the maximum weight for hand baggage is 8kg and dimensions for carry-on baggage: max 55x40x20cm. You can also bring a personal item like a purse or laptop bag but please consider that total weight should be 8kg. With our kindest regards
@AARairport We are so glad to open the spring season with our new connection from Munich to Denmark ✈️

Even in these special times, we want to make sure that you feel comfortable during your flight. We kindly remind you to go through the information about our latest #boarding procedures, which you can find at the link: https://t.co/cPywiA3ehK
#WeCare https://t.co/fIvF2hESwQ
@flywithTheBoff Impressive! thanks for sharing The BOFF 😉
@charliesim_ Marvellous 😍, thanks!

@setyourmindfree We have never carried shark fins but we are not a cargo company. At your disposal for any further information.
With our kindest regards

data.text: @AARairport @lufthansa @MUC_Airport So honored and happy to fly towards the City of Smiles. Thank you for your welcome! 💙

Happy to announce a new destination in collaboration with @AARairport.
Starting March 29th, 2021, three flights a week will connect #Munich with #Aarhus, the second most important Danish city after Copenhagen. https://t.co/2FlpLmzNtV
#BackInTheSkyTogether
Photo by Anders Trærup https://t.co/y945722yKG

@LauraBajardi Gentilissima Laura, siamo spiacenti per questa cancellazione. Ti abbiamo risposto anche in privato, chiedendoti la gentilezza di volerci inviare il codice di prenotazione per una verifica interna. Ti preghiamo di inviarcelo tramite messaggio privato per ragioni di privacy

On December 8th our social media channels will not be staffed, but our Sales Center colleagues will be there from 9 am to 5 pm to assist you. 
#StaySafe #WeCare #WeAreAirDolomiti

Out of sight doesn't always mean out of mind 💙
We think of you wherever you are and wishes you all a very nice weekend. https://t.co/WCFQOIA8bk

#StaySafe #WeAreAirDolomiti #AirDolomiti #AdAstra #Settimocielo #BackInTheSkyTogether⁣ #WeCare #StrongerTogether #HereForYou https://t.co/QtIwbU3dSa

The captain and the first officer welcome you on board! 😍❤️✈️⁣Thanks, Francesca for the marvellous📸
#BackInTheSkyTogether #WeAreAirDolomiti 
⁣https://t.co/Evndg2hP11 https://t.co/hRRWesLWhX

Stay home now, book your discounted trip and fly later! 

⏰ Offer valid from November 27th til 30th on all Air Dolomiti flights
💸 Save up to 48€
☎️ Bookable via our Sales Center +390452886140 or via salescenter@airdolomiti.it 

Terms & conditions https://t.co/c5w27g7eaY https://t.co/45DEQ6PBDs

#AirDolomiti obtains the renewal of the certification ISO 9001 and ISO/IEC 27001 following the audit by the team of DNV GL – Business Assurance. 
For more info https://t.co/rqLolNkyGj https://t.co/xQyIKBAfLA
@psaviousa @_CoaTD 😊Truly honored and now also a bit hungry! 😋😁

@psaviousa @_CoaTD Thank you so much for your compliments, Piero. 
That's very kind of you! 😊

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Following the latest dispositions by the Institutions for the containment of contagion from Covid-19, Air Dolomiti and F.A. s.r.l. announce the postponing of flights from #Forlì “Luigi Ridolfi” airport to #Munich scheduled for December 1, 2020. https://t.co/ApqTPuqKnq https://t.co/RcohWT8R8i

data.text:
Due to the current Covid-19 situation our #flightschedule has been modified. We therefore kindly remind our passengers to regularly #check the #status of their flights:
👉 https://t.co/AYN9XNBEvp
☑️ MY BOOKINGS
💬 https://t.co/o9eUBINZHY
#WeAreAirDolomiti #WeCare https://t.co/aec4RtyJho
@Obladii_ Hi Giusi, new job opportunities are published at the following link: https://t.co/qKJwL1vlL5. Take care!
@john_mendelson Thank you John 😍 Looking forward to welcoming you onboard again! Take care

Our crew is always happy to welcome you on board. ✈️⁣
Thank you, Marta and Francesco, for keeping on smiling with your eyes! ❤️😊⁣

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AirDolomiti #AdAstra #Settimocielo #BackInTheSkyTogether⁣
#WeCare #StrongerTogether #HereForYou https://t.co/qlnJIY4COF

@dietayls Thanks to you for you beautiful words! Our passengers satisfaction is our priority, and we are glad to read that you enjoyed your flight! We will forward your message to our colleagues and we look forward to welcoming you on board again soon :)

Immerse yourself in an authentic and wild alpine valley rich of naturalistic heritages and traditions. Fly to #Cuneo and discover #ValleMaira 
👉 https://t.co/XvFwUek0AC

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese
Ph. Credits: Roberto Croci https://t.co/KthLi80hxn

data.text:
Nonstante tutte le difficoltà del momento, non potevamo mancare all'appuntamento con #TTG2020. Con la nostra presenza e assieme ai colleghi #Lufthansa abbiamo voluto dare un chiaro segnale di positività e speranza💪🌈✈️
#WeAreAirDolomiti #WeAreLufthansaGroup #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/V8pIdSPKz9

Right at the start of the #pandemic, we set up a taskforce of 7 colleagues who have now dealt with a total of 12,360 #refunds. As of today 15.10.2020, all refunds have been finalised. Special thanks go to our #passengers for their understanding. #StaySafe #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/V7mvbp4B7i
@Grumpy39417309 Thank You! 😄

Yesterday, our CEO Joerg Eberhart met the BOD of Luigi Ridolfi Airport, Forlì. Topic of the day was the airport's restart and its future potential. #Forlì airport will resume operations on Oct 31st, with Air Dolomiti serving the Munich HUB starting Dec 1st.

#BACKInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/ffFjuxqeLy

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text: @viaggioAir Munich is one of our main hubs, on our website you may find our latest network updates https://t.co/4mSoZ8iuBW. Stay tuned 😉
@viaggioAir Hi, for sure the Emilia Romagna has loads to offer, from the seaside to breathtaking landscapes and cities 🌊🏙️⛰️
@viaggioAir Siamo felici di poter offrire questo nuovo collegamento che amplierà la scelta dei passeggeri✈️
@viaggioAir buongiorno, siamo lieti di poter offrire questo nuovo collegamento che amplierà la scelta dei passeggeri grazie a nuove frequenze ✈️
@toscanaeroporti 😍😍😍✈️
@Lion_eye Hi Katie, thank you for getting in touch. Our airline operates passenger flights. Best, Veronika

data.text: @alessm84 Gentile Alessandro, grazie di averci contattati. Come confermato al telefono, abbiamo mandato richiesta a PayPal la settimana scorsa e già sollecitato una risposta. Le chiediamo la cortesia di pazientare, non appena possibile torneremo da lei. Buona giornata, Michaela
Forlì is the perfect starting point for explorers and yes, it will surprise you! Ancient monuments, wonderful towns and to the Romagna Riviera.  https://t.co/2apWBHIjXt
@mrs_bighead Thank you so much, Camila! 💙 We are happy to hear that  😊and we'll will advise also our crew members!😉Waiting for you on board!✈️

Not only #Cuneo itself is worth a visit with its wide streets partly in renaissance style, but also its surroundings with castles, vineyards and mountains... Feeling the Italian vibe yet and ready to take off? 😉✈️https://t.co/fkXpx6yGjz
@elisabetta_sann Certamente Elisabetta, siamo a completa disposizione! 😉

As health and protection of our passengers and employees remain our top priority, we would like to remind you that the use of the surgical mask is mandatory during all of our flights. All details here 👉 https://t.co/Djvr0Qx6x9

#WeCare #BackInTheSkyTogether https://t.co/wW1hZDrj2N

Upgrades, hotels, car rentals and so much more... 😍 
Yeah but how? With Air Dolomiti and Miles&More!  
😉 Start today by becoming a member of Europe’s leading frequent flyer and awards program. Air Dolomiti and other 300 partners are waiting for you!  https://t.co/N8iV5MU6rI

data.text:
@Nick4125 Could you text to us a private message on Facebook, for privacy reasons, with your booking number?
Thank You for the understanding.

@Nick4125 We know the situation and we are very sorry for your son.
For privacy reasons neither Crew or other passengers can be photographed; it needs a prior authorization. Inside the plane there are also sensitive areas (such as the cockpit) that it is forbidden to film and th

@Nick4125 Dear Nick, we apologize for any inconvenience we caused you. Can you explain to us what happened?
Your Air Dolomiti Social Media Team

urls.title: Biglietti Aerei e Voli per la Germania | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Prenota il tuo volo diretto per la Germania con le vantaggiose tariffe di Air Dolomiti: esplora le nostre rotte e viaggia comodo e sicuro con i nostri servizi.

data.text: @NiccolGiacchett Qualora ci fossero dei cambiamenti o delle anticipazioni, ne daremo notizia su tutti i nostri canali social e naturalmente anche sul nostro sito https://t.co/790iT0Rilu. Grazie infinite per averci scritto, Niccolò💙 #StayTuned 😉

urls.title: Biglietti Aerei e Voli per la Germania | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Prenota il tuo volo diretto per la Germania con le vantaggiose tariffe di Air Dolomiti: esplora le nostre rotte e viaggia comodo e sicuro con i nostri servizi.

data.text: @NiccolGiacchett Per ricevere aggiornamenti puoi scriverci, visitare il nostro sito https://t.co/790iT0Rilu e restare connesso con noi. Non appena avremo informazioni certe, la notizia verrà pubblicata su tutti i nostri canali! 😉
@NiccolGiacchett Gentilissimo Niccolò, siamo fiduciosi anche noi di poter ripartire con la tratta 💙 #Ancona - #Monaco 💙. L'operativo invernale è ancora in fase di definizione.

@psaviousa Grazie Piero, i complimenti sono sempre graditi.
Siamo felici di averti riportato a casa attraversando il #Settimocielo 😊

@psaviousa @Airport_FRA @inflightFeed Grazie Piero, i complimenti sono sempre graditi.
Siamo felici di averti riportato a casa attraversando il #Settimocielo 😊
@toscanaeroporti 😍😍
@Bahstonljo is resolved. Thank you for your patience. Best, Veronika

@Bahstonljo Hi Luca, thanks for getting in touch. Our online shop is temporarily down due to technical reasons. For this reason, we have suspended our sales. We would like to apologize for this inconvenience: we are going to advise customers on our channels as soon as the issue i
@erica_fiorini Speriamo allora almeno in un po' di meritato riposo per te 😉 stay safe!
@erica_fiorini grazie Erica! buon Ferragosto e buone ferie a te 🏖️

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On August 15 our social media channels will not be staffed and our Service Center will remain closed.
For #assistance please consult https://t.co/xrBI3IsZw5
We'll be back on Sunday, Aug 16!

@Benna80 Se invece desiderassi ricevere update su avanzamenti della tua pratica, puoi contattare il nostro Service Center telefonicamente al numero riportato in precedenza. Ci scusiamo nuovamente per l'accaduto. 1/2

urls.title: Biglietti Aerei e Voli per la Germania | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Prenota il tuo volo diretto per la Germania con le vantaggiose tariffe di Air Dolomiti: esplora le nostre rotte e viaggia comodo e sicuro con i nostri servizi.

data.text: @Benna80 ciao Daniele, ti invitiamo a scriverci un reclamo formale utilizzando il form online al seguente link: https://t.co/mOtIXVKvT7. I colleghi del reparto customer-relations saranno lieti di darti assistenza in merito. 1/1

@GennyRandom ciao Genny,  a seguito dell'eccezionalità del periodo, stiamo riprendendo gradualmente diversi collegamenti verso Monaco e Francoforte. Per ora Rimini non è inclusa nel nostro network, ma Bologna sì. Buona giornata!

@Adriana49939210 Hi Adriana, we are sorry for the incovenience. Our colleagues are working with the respective airports to trace your missing luggage. I am sure they will contact you back as soon as they receive some updates. Best, Veronika
@GennyRandom ciao Genny, speriamo di tornare presto a volare anche da Ancona! ✈️ andremo a pubblicare tutti gli aggiornamenti disponibili in questa sezione: https://t.co/rlVRKiET6Z. a presto!

@Adriana49939210 Hi Adriana, thanks for reaching out. We are sorry for any incovenience about your flight. For irregularities concerning your luggage, if you need a prompt answer kindly phone us at 045 2886140. We'll be glad to help you out. Veronika

@Benna80 ciao Daniele, desideriamo scusarci per l'inconveniente. Per ricevere aggiornamenti in merito alla tua pratica ti invitiamo a contattare il nostro service center al numero: 045 2886140. A disposizione, Veronika
@dusairport Schönes Wochenende!
@valeriekbyeeee 😎 Ciao Valerie!

@arenadiverona Dalla città degli innamorati al cuore dell'Europa 😍
https://t.co/0QSvLX8rRc
